alert.note: Alert for Starr; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Starr and southeastern Zapata Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 621 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong, but weakening thunderstorm 9 miles west of Falcon Dam, or 17 miles southwest of Lopeno, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lopeno, El Sauz, New Falcon, Falcon Dam, Salineno, Falcon Heights and Falcon State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Brownsville.
